other_tests.findings: Choledocholithiasis with 2 stones at the level of ampulla causing extrahepatic and intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The CBD measures 12 mm. Minimal enhancement of intrahepatic biliary duct suggestive of mild cholangitis. Distended gall bladder without definite gallstones. Atrophic pancreas with minimal dilatation of the pancreatic duct measuring up to 4 mm.
